about_the_game:
The Fanciful Chronicle is a singleplayer first-person narrative game, built on exploring a lost friendship between two long-parted friends.

Experience a heartfelt story


As Mike, you find yourself at a highschool reunion where all kinds of memories return to you as you meet your friend Sam. As you explore these memories, Mike discovers more and more about his past - or lack thereof. In the world that Mike knows, everything is just a bit more... vivid.

Play fun minigames


In addition to a fleshed-out, voice-acted story - The Fanciful Chronicle also features several small minigames. These minigames help you to delve into the world in the way Mike sees it. The gameplay and tone of the story are as fanciful as Mike himself.

Ultimately, this game is about growing up and coming of age - and all the struggles that come with it.

The Fanciful Chronicle has Gamepad support, which is advised.
